name: swiftsplit
description: SwiftSplit - Fast, simple cross-border payments for freelancers and teams

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ../ai-modules && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && cd ../contracts && npm run compile
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../contracts && npm test

author: SwiftSplit Team
